Data.event_text: Mayor of Rio de Janeiro, Eduardo Paes, announces the cancellation of the city's street carnival.

links.text: -"Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro cancela Carnaval de rua deste ano". CNN Brasil (in Brazilian Portuguese). Retrieved 2022-01-15.-

Data.event_text: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, São Paulo's street carnival is canceled by the city hall.

links.text: -"Carnaval de rua é cancelado em São Paulo". Folha de S.Paulo (in Brazilian Portuguese). 2022-01-06. Retrieved 2022-01-15.-

Data.event_text: A dike at the Pau Branco Mine overflows in Nova Lima, due to excessive rain. Water reserved by the structure cuts off BR-040 (connecting Belo Horizonte to Rio de Janeiro) and damages vehicles on the highway.

links.text: -"Dique de barragem transborda em Nova Lima, e água invade BR-040". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 2022-01-08. Retrieved 2022-01-09.-

Data.event_text: A rockfall from a canyon hits four boats with tourists who were strolling on Lake Furnas in Capitólio (southwest of Minas Gerais), leaving ten dead and 32 injured.

links.text: -"Cânion se desprende, atinge lanchas e deixa feridos em Capitólio (MG); veja vídeo". Folha de S.Paulo (in Brazilian Portuguese). 2022-01-08. Retrieved 2022-01-08.-

Data.event_text: A landslide destroys a 19th century mansion and a property where a warehouse operated in Morro da Forca, in the historic center of Ouro Preto, Minas Gerais.

links.text: -"Deslizamento destrói casarão histórico em Ouro Preto; VÍDEOS". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 2022-01-13. Retrieved 2022-01-25.-

Data.event_text: Footballer Robinho is ultimately sentenced to 9 years in prison for rape in Italy.

links.text: -"Última instância da Justiça italiana condena Robinho por violência sexual". GE (in Brazilian Portuguese). 2022-01-19. Retrieved 2022-02-01.-

Data.event_text: Brazilian drug regulator Anvisa approves the use of the Sinovac Coronavac vaccine for children between the ages of 6 and 11 years.

links.text: -"Brazil drug regulator allows CoronaVac for kids aged 6–17". Agência Brasil. 2022-01-20. Retrieved 2022-01-22.-

Data.event_text: Two men invade the Manaus aero club and set fire to an IBAMA helicopter that was parked there.

links.text: -"Helicóptero do Ibama é incendiado durante ataque em Manaus". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 2022-01-24. Retrieved 2022-01-25.-

Data.event_text: Congolese immigrant Moïse Kabagambe is murdered by three men in Barra da Tijuca, Rio de Janeiro.

links.text: -"Congolese man beaten to death in Brazil over unpaid wages, family say". CNN. 2 February 2022. Retrieved 5 February 2022.-
-"Justiça por Moïse: ativistas protestam em memória do congolês morto no Rio". G1. 5 February 2022. Retrieved 5 February 2022.-

Data.event_text: - A series of floods and landslides kill 28 people.

links.text: -"Brazil – Floods and landslides, update (INMET, media)". Directorate-General for European Civil Protection and Humanitarian Aid Operations. Retrieved 3 February 2022.-
-"Brazil rains: São Paulo floods kill 21 and destroy homes". BBC News. 31 January 2022. Retrieved 31 January 2022.-
-"Rain-fed landslides, flooding kill at least 19 in Brazil". AP News. 30 January 2022. Retrieved 31 January 2022.-
-"Brazil – Floods and Landslides in Sao Paolo Leave at Least 19 Dead". Flood List. Retrieved 31 January 2022.-

Data.event_text: A construction accident on Line 6-Orange of the São Paulo Metro causes a crater to open on Marginal Tietê towards Rodovia Ayrton Senna. The rupture of a sewer gallery is said to have caused the accident.

links.text: -"Obra do Metrô desaba e abre cratera na Marginal Tietê". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 2022-02-01. Retrieved 2022-02-01.-

Data.event_text: Protests in memory of Moïse Kabagambe take place in several Brazilian capitals and at the Brazilian embassy in Berlin, Germany. The protests denounce racism and xenophobia, as well as calling for the impeachment of President Jair Bolsonaro.

links.text: -Phillips, Tom (2022-02-05). "Anti-racism protesters march in Brazil after refugee murdered in Rio". the Guardian. Retrieved 2022-02-06. but marchers had a great deal to say about him, chanting "Fora Bolsonaro!" ("Bolsonaro out!") as they filed down the beach.-

Data.event_text: The centenary of Modern Art Week in Brazil is celebrated.

links.text: -"Exposições e eventos celebram e rediscutem a Semana de Arte Moderna". Agência Brasil (in Brazilian Portuguese). 2022-02-13. Retrieved 2022-02-15.-

Data.event_text: Heavy rains cause flooding and landslides in Petrópolis, resulting in parts of the city being destroyed.

links.text: -"Forte chuva em Petrópolis causa inundações, arrasta carros e provoca queda de barreiras". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 2022-02-15. Retrieved 2022-02-15.-

Data.event_text: A fire hits a building near the FIESP on Avenida Paulista. There were no injuries.

links.text: -"Prédio pega fogo na Avenida Paulista; Bombeiros afirmam que incêndio foi controlado". CNN Brasil (in Brazilian Portuguese). Retrieved 2022-03-03.-

Data.event_text: At the UN Security Council, Brazil and 10 other countries vote in favor of the resolution condemning Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

links.text: -"Rússia veta resolução condenando invasão da Ucrânia no Conselho de Segurança da ONU; Brasil vota a favor". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 25 February 2022. Retrieved 2022-02-27.-

Data.event_text: Mauro Carlesse, who was removed as governor of Tocantins, officially resigns from his position. Acting governor Wanderlei Barbosa (since October 2021), is sworn in permanently.

links.text: -"Governador afastado do Tocantins, Mauro Carlesse renuncia ao cargo". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 11 March 2022. Retrieved 2022-03-11.-

Data.event_text: The Telegram application is blocked in Brazil by decision of Supreme Federal Court minister Alexandre de Moraes.

links.text: -"Moraes determina bloqueio do aplicativo de mensagens Telegram em todo o Brasil". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 18 March 2022. Retrieved 2022-03-21.-

Data.event_text: New storms hit Petrópolis, mountainous region of Rio de Janeiro. At least 5 people died and another 3 are missing.

links.text: -"Chuvas em Petrópolis deixam pelo menos cinco mortos, informa Defesa Civil". CNN Brasil (in Brazilian Portuguese). Retrieved 2022-03-21.-

Data.event_text: Singer Anitta becomes the first Brazilian artist to reach first place in the global ranking on the Spotify platform, with her hit single Envolver.

links.text: -"Anitta é a primeira brasileira a ficar em 1° lugar no ranking global do Spotify: "Porta aberta com muita dificuldade"". globo.com (in Brazilian Portuguese). Retrieved 2022-03-26.-

Data.event_text: -  The ninth edition of Lollapalooza Brasil is held.

links.text: -"Lollapalooza 2022 começa nesta sexta com Strokes, Doja Cat, Pabllo Vittar e mais: como será o 1ª dia?". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 25 March 2022. Retrieved 2022-03-26.-

Data.event_text: Police move in to disperse a notorious drug market in São Paulo.

links.text: -"Brazil's largest open-air drug market disperses after police raids". la Prensa Latina. March 30, 2022. Retrieved July 12, 2022.-

Data.event_text: The only children's television program shown on free-to-air television, Bom Dia & Cia comes to an end after 28 years on the air.

links.text: -Entretenimento, Uai (31 March 2022). "Bom Dia & Cia não agrada, e Silvio Santos tira programa do ar após 28 anos". www.uai.com.br (in Brazilian Portuguese). Retrieved 2022-04-01.-

Data.event_text: Heavy rain causes floods and landslides in Rio de Janeiro; and municipalities in Costa Verde and Baixada Fluminense.

links.text: -Entretenimento, Uai. "Após chuvas, quatro cidades do Rio de Janeiro já decretam estado de emergência". CNN Brasil (in Brazilian Portuguese). Retrieved 2022-04-05.-

Data.event_text: A bull storms into the stands of a rodeo in Patrocínio, Minas Gerais, causing 16 injuries.

links.text: -"Touro invade arquibancada durante rodeio em Patrocínio (MG) e deixa 16 feridos". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). Retrieved 2022-04-08.-

Data.event_text: Christ the Protector, a new statue of Jesus Christ is constructed in Encantado, Rio Grande do Sul. It is 5m taller than the Christ the Redeemer statue in Rio de Janeiro

links.text: -Jack Guy; Vasco Cotovio; Rodrigo Pedroso; Francesca Street (3 May 2022). "Brazil has a towering new statue of Jesus". CNN. Retrieved 2022-05-04.-
-"New Christ statue in Brazil's Encantado to be taller than Rio's". BBC. 11 April 2021. Retrieved 12 April 2021.-

Data.event_text: A helicopter crashes during a training flight in Contagem, Minas Gerais. Both pilot and student who were on the aircraft, were rescued.

links.text: -"Helicóptero cai em Contagem, na Grande BH; duas pessoas são resgatadas com vida". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 11 April 2022. Retrieved 2022-04-14.-

Data.event_text: Federal deputy Daniel Silveira (PTB/RJ) is sentenced by the STF to 8 years and 9 months in prison and the loss of political rights for encouraging undemocratic acts.

links.text: -"STF condena Daniel Silveira à perda do mandato e dos direitos políticos e a 8 anos e 9 meses de prisão". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 20 April 2022. Retrieved 2022-04-27.-

Data.event_text: A three-story building collapses in Vila Velha (Greater Vitória area), killing three people from the same family.

links.text: -"Desabamento de prédio de três andares deixa mortos da mesma família no ES". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 21 April 2022. Retrieved 2022-04-22.-

Data.event_text: President Jair Bolsonaro issues a pardon to Daniel Silveira, after being convicted by the Supreme Federal Court.

links.text: -"Brazil's Bolsonaro pardons lawmaker convicted at top court". Associated Press. 22 April 2022. Retrieved 2022-04-22.-

Data.event_text: A bus accident on the Régis Bittencourt Highway (near Miracatu), kills singer Aleksandro, from the duo Conrado & Aleksandro, as well as five other band members.

links.text: -"Ônibus de Conrado e Aleksandro sofre acidente em Miracatu; um dos cantores e outros 5 morreram". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 7 May 2022. Retrieved 2022-05-07.-

Data.event_text: A plane carrying parachutists makes an emergency landing in the rural area of Boituva. Two people are confirmed dead, with seven others injured.

links.text: -"Dois morrem após avião com paraquedistas fazer pouso de emergência em Boituva". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 11 May 2022. Retrieved 2022-05-15.-

Data.event_text: Paulo Cupertino, accused of killing actor Rafael Miguel and his parents in 2019, is arrested by the São Paulo Civil Police after three years on the run.

links.text: -"Após ficar quase 3 anos foragido, Paulo Cupertino é preso em São Paulo". CNN Brasil (in Brazilian Portuguese). Retrieved 2022-05-17.-

Data.event_text: Unanimously, the Legislative Assembly of São Paulo votes on removing the mandate of Arthur do Val (UNIÃO) for breach of parliamentary decorum. The former deputy was denounced in March after private audios were leaked to the public, where he made sexually explicit comments towards Ukrainian women refugees while on a visit to a refugee camp during the Russian invasion.

links.text: -Rodrigues, Rodrigo (17 May 2022). "Alesp aprova cassação de Arthur do Val, que perde os direitos políticos por oito anos; é o 1° mandato cassado em 23 anos". G1 (in Portuguese). Retrieved 15 July 2022.-
-"Alesp cassa mandato do deputado Arthur do Val, que fica inelegível". Metrópoles (in Brazilian Portuguese). 17 May 2022. Retrieved 2022-05-19.-

Data.event_text: A police operation in Vila Cruzeiro, Rio de Janeiro, leaves at least 23 people dead.

links.text: -"Operação da Vila Cruzeiro deixa 23 mortos, diz Polícia Civil". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 26 May 2022. Retrieved 2022-05-27.-

Data.event_text: A man named Genivaldo de Jesus, is tortured and murdered during a police raid in Umbaúba, Sergipe. Agents used a Federal Highway Police vehicle as an improvised gas chamber and trapped the victim in the trunk.

links.text: -"Homem morre após ser colocado em porta-malas de viatura da PRF e aspirar fumaça, em Sergipe". O Globo (in Brazilian Portuguese). 25 May 2022. Retrieved 2022-05-27.-

Data.event_text: Heavy rains cause flooding and landslides in municipalities in Greater Recife, leaving at least 129 people dead.

links.text: -"Sobe para 35 nº de mortos pelas chuvas no Grande Recife; só neste sábado, foram 30 óbitos". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 2022-05-28. Retrieved 2022-05-28.-

Data.event_text: Indigenist Bruno Pereira and British journalist Dom Phillips are murdered during a boat trip through the Vale do Javari, the second-largest indigenous area in Brazil.

links.text: -Ana Maria Campos; Roberto Fonseca (June 15, 2022). "Suspect confesses to murder of Dom Phillips and Bruno in the Amazon". Correio Braziliense. Retrieved June 16, 2022.-
-Ana Maria Campos; Roberto Fonseca (June 15, 2022). "Suspect confesses to murder of Dom Phillips and Bruno in the Amazon". Correio Braziliense. Retrieved June 16, 2022.[permanent dead link]-

Data.event_text: The search begins for the whereabouts of indigenist Bruno Araújo Pereira and English journalist Dom Phillips, who disappeared while traveling to Atalaia do Norte, Amazonas.

links.text: -"Desaparecidos na Amazônia: o que já se sabe sobre o caso". CNN Brasil (in Brazilian Portuguese). Retrieved 2022-06-08.-

Data.event_text: A 6.5 magnitude earthquake hits the border between Acre and Peru.

links.text: -"Com magnitude 6.5, terremoto no Acre é o maior registrado no país". Metrópoles (in Brazilian Portuguese). 8 June 2022. Retrieved 2022-06-08.-

Data.event_text: In São Paulo, the first case of monkeypox in Brazil is confirmed. The patient is a 41-year-old man who traveled to Spain.

links.text: -"Primeiro caso de varíola dos macacos no Brasil é confirmado na cidade de São Paulo". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 8 June 2022. Retrieved 2022-06-08.-

Data.event_text: Both Bruno Pereira and Dom Phillips are confirmed to have been murdered. Amarildo da Costa de Oliveira confessed to committing the crime, after having been arrested by the Federal Police, along with his brother.

links.text: -"Irmãos confessam envolvimento nas mortes de Bruno Pereira e Dom Phillips na Amazônia, dizem fontes da PF". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 15 June 2022. Retrieved 2022-06-17.-

Data.event_text: A plane carrying footballer Neymar Jr. and his family make an emergency landing in Boa Vista, Roraima, after a problem with the windshield. No one was injured.

links.text: -"Avião de Neymar faz pouso de emergência em chegada ao Brasil". UOL (in Brazilian Portuguese). Retrieved 2022-06-22.-

Data.event_text: Former Minister of Education, Milton Ribeiro, is arrested by the Federal Police in an operation investigating embezzlement of funds at the MEC.

links.text: -"PF prende ex-ministro da Educação Milton Ribeiro". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 22 June 2022. Retrieved 2022-06-22.-

Data.event_text: A small plane crashes on a private farm in Salto de Pirapora, killing three people.

links.text: -"Queda de avião de pequeno porte deixa três mortos no interior de SP". Band (in Brazilian Portuguese). 25 June 2022. Retrieved 2022-06-27.-

Data.event_text: Shootings occur after attempted robberies at shopping malls in Rio de Janeiro and Campinas, São Paulo. In Rio de Janeiro, a security guard was killed and in Campinas, a suspect died and two security guards were shot.

links.text: -"Tiroteio deixa segurança morto no Village Mall, shopping de luxo na Barra da Tijuca". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 25 June 2022. Retrieved 2022-06-27.-
-"Assalto a joalherias do Shopping D. Pedro deixa 2 seguranças baleados e gera correria em Campinas". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 25 June 2022. Retrieved 2022-06-27.-

Data.event_text: Pedro Guimarães resigns as president of Caixa Econômica Federal following allegations of moral and sexual harassment against female employees.

links.text: -"Pedro Guimarães pede demissão da presidência da Caixa após denúncias de assédio sexual". Jornal Nacional - G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 30 June 2022. Retrieved 2022-07-07.-

Data.event_text: Heavy rain causes flooding in at least 50 municipalities in Alagoas.

links.text: -Entretenimento, Uai (4 July 2022). "Sobe para 56 o número de cidades de Alagoas em emergência por causa das chuvas". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). Retrieved 2022-07-07.-

Data.event_text: A school bus accident leaves 25 children injured and 1 deceased in Treviso, Santa Catarina.

links.text: -"Acidente com ônibus escolar deixa 25 crianças feridas e um morto em SC". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 4 July 2022. Retrieved 2022-07-04.-

Data.event_text: Daniella Marques takes office as president of Caixa Econômica Federal.

links.text: -"Daniella Marques toma posse na presidência da Caixa em cerimônia fechada". G1. 2022-05-07. Retrieved 2022-07-07.-

Data.event_text: Brasília becomes the first city in Brazil to rollout the 5G network.

links.text: -"5G começa no DF com 100 antenas a partir da meia-noite". Economia (in Brazilian Portuguese). 2022-07-05. Retrieved 2024-01-14.-

Data.event_text: Marcelo Aloizio de Arruda, a municipal guard and leader of the Workers' Party, is murdered during his birthday party in Foz do Iguaçu, Paraná. Jorge José da Rocha Guaranho, a  federal police officer, shot and killed Arruda, after breaking into the party site shouting slogans in favor of President Jair Bolsonaro.

links.text: -"Geral Polícia do Paraná investiga morte de guarda municipal em Foz do Iguaçu". Agencia Brasil (in Portuguese). 11 July 2022. Retrieved July 12, 2022.-
-"Guarda Municipal que era tesoureiro do PT é morto a tiros por apoiador de Bolsonaro na própria festa de aniversário, em Foz do Iguaçu". G1. 2022-07-10. Retrieved 2022-07-10.-
-"Saiba quem era Marcelo Arruda, guarda municipal morto por bolsonarista". UOL. 2022-07-10. Retrieved 2022-07-10.-

Data.event_text: A fire hits a 10-story commercial building in the Rua 25 de Março region, in São Paulo.

links.text: -"Incêndio atinge quatro imóveis no Centro de SP há mais de 20 horas; bombeiros ficam feridos e área é interditada". G1. 2022-07-10. Retrieved 2022-07-15.-

Data.event_text: An anesthesiologist named Giovanni Quintella Bezerra is arrested red-handed after being filmed raping a woman during childbirth in São João de Meriti, Rio de Janeiro.

links.text: -"Anestesista é preso em flagrante por estupro de uma paciente que passava por cesárea no RJ". G1. 11 July 2022.-

Data.event_text: At least 17 people are shot dead during a police operation in Complexo do Alemão, Rio de Janeiro.

links.text: -"Dezessete pessoas são mortas em operação policial no Complexo do Alemão". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 21 July 2022. Retrieved 2022-08-01.-

Data.event_text: Red Bull Bragantino central defender Renan is arrested after being involved in a car accident on Rodovia Alkindar Monteiro Junqueira (between Itatiba and Bragança Paulista), which caused the death of a motorcyclist.

links.text: -"Zagueiro Renan, do Bragantino, é preso pela polícia após acidente com morte em Bragança Paulista". ge.globo (in Brazilian Portuguese). 22 July 2022. Retrieved 2022-08-01.-

Data.event_text: A major explosion occurs due to a gas leak, leaving 4 people injured in the district of Água Fria, the North Zone of Recife, Pernambuco.

links.text: -"Vídeo mostra explosão causada por vazamento de gás no Recife; quatro pessoas ficaram feridas". G1 Globo (in Portuguese). 25 July 2022. Retrieved January 27, 2024.-

Data.event_text: Start of the 2022 Census.

links.text: -"Censo 2022 começa em todo país". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). August 2022. Retrieved 2022-08-01.-

Data.event_text: The electoral campaign for the general election begins.

links.text: -"Campanha eleitoral começa em 16 de agosto, e propaganda no dia 26; veja as regras". Agência Câmara de Notícias (in Brazilian Portuguese). Retrieved 2022-08-11.-

Data.event_text: Alexandre de Moraes takes office as the 55th president of the Superior Electoral Court.

links.text: -"Moraes toma posse como presidente do TSE em cerimônia com autoridades dos três poderes e ex-presidentes da República". G1. 16 August 2022. Retrieved 2022-08-18.-

Data.event_text: By 48 votes to 2, the Rio de Janeiro City Council revokes the mandate of councilor Gabriel Monteiro (PL) for breach of parliamentary decorum. This is in response to accusations against Monteiro for sexual harassment against former advisors; filming graphic content with minors and homeless people; and rape.

links.text: -"Gabriel Monteiro tem mandato cassado pela Câmara do Rio; veja como foi a votação". O Globo (in Brazilian Portuguese). 18 August 2022. Retrieved 2022-08-18.-

Data.event_text: After almost nine years of renovation, the Ipiranga Museum reopens in São Paulo.

links.text: -"Museu do Ipiranga é reinaugurado oficialmente em SP para autoridades e patrocinadores". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 6 September 2022. Retrieved 2022-09-07.-

Data.event_text: A clandestine vessel sinks near Cotijuba Island, Pará, leaving 22 people dead.

links.text: -"Sobe para 18 o número de mortos em naufrágio de barco ilegal no Pará". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 10 September 2022. Retrieved 2022-09-10.-

Data.event_text: Actor José Dumont is arrested on suspicion of storing child pornography and for allegations of sexual abuse towards a 12-year-old.

links.text: -"Ator José Dumont é preso por armazenar pornografia infantil". G1 (in Brazilian Portuguese). 15 September 2022. Retrieved 2022-09-15.-

Data.event_text: First round of general elections. For President, candidates Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) and Jair Bolsonaro (PL) go to the second round.

links.text: -"Lula e Bolsonaro vão para o segundo turno, e disputa ao Planalto será definida no dia 30". G1. 2022-10-02. Retrieved 2022-10-03.-

Data.event_text: A toxic gas leak kills a person and leaves more than a thousand temporarily homeless in 8 neighborhoods of Pontal in São Paulo.
An armed 15-year-old boy shoots three students at a public school in Sobral, Ceará. Two victims were discharged, while the third died four days later.

links.text: -"Adolescente atira contra três estudantes em escola pública no Ceará". Folha de Pernambuco. 2022-10-10.-
-"Morre aluno atingido por tiro em escola pública em Sobral, no Ceará". CNN Brasil. 2022-10-10.-

Data.event_text: An accident involving a small plane causes the runway at Congonhas Airport to be closed for 9 hours and the cancellation of 140 flights in 15 states and the Federal District.

links.text: -"Acidente em Congonhas provoca atrasos e cancelamentos de voos em 15 estados e no DF; veja a lista". G1. 2022-10-10.-

Data.event_text: Paulo Dantas, governor of Alagoas, is removed from office by the Superior Court of Justice after being the target of an investigation from the Federal Police and the Federal Public Ministry on alleged embezzlement within the state's Legislative Assembly. Vice-governor José Wanderley Neto takes office on an interim basis.

links.text: -"Paulo Dantas, governador de Alagoas, é alvo de operação policial e afastado do cargo pelo STJ". G1. 2022-10-11.-

Data.event_text: The Civil Police of Rio Grande do Sul open an investigation on racist offenses against singer Seu Jorge during his performance in Porto Alegre.

links.text: -"Polícia Civil abre investigação sobre relatos de racismo contra o cantor Seu Jorge em Porto Alegre". Gaúcha ZH. 2022-10-17.-

Data.event_text: A helicopter crashes near a residential area in Parque da Rocinha, São Paulo, causing two injuries.

links.text: -"Helicóptero cai próximo a residências na Zona Sul de SP". G1. 2022-10-20.-

Data.event_text: Former deputy Roberto Jefferson is arrested after throwing a grenade and injuring two Federal Police agents who went to his home in Comendador Levy Gasparian, Rio de Janeiro. The agents went to serve an arrest warrant from the Supreme Federal Court against him after he recorded a video of him insulting court minister Carmen Lúcia. Jefferson surrendered to police after resisting arrest for around eight hours.

links.text: -"Roberto Jefferson se entrega após resistir à prisão e ferir dois agentes da PF". UOL. 2022-10-23.-

Data.event_text: Brazilians elect Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva of the Workers' Party as president, with 50.9% of the vote, in the second round of the presidential election. This makes him the first person to defeat an incumbent running for a second term, the first person to run for a third non-consecutive term, and the oldest person to assume the office of president, at the age of 77.

links.text: -Rocha, Camilo (31 October 2022). "Lula da Silva will return to Brazil's presidency in stunning comeback". CNN. Retrieved 31 October 2022.-
-Boadle, Anthony (31 October 2022). "Brazil leftist Lula wins third presidential term to redeem tarnished legacy". Reuters. Retrieved 31 October 2022.-
-Gomes, Rossini (31 October 2022). "Lula será o presidente mais velho do Brasil e o 2° por mais tempo no cargo". R7 (in Portuguese). Retrieved 31 October 2022.-
-"Lula vence o segundo turno e volta para o terceiro mandato de presidente". G1. 2022-10-31.-

Data.event_text: In protest against Lula's victory in the second round of the presidential election, truck drivers block highways in 23 states.

links.text: -"Caminhoneiros fecham rodovias contra resultado das urnas após derrota de Bolsonaro". G1. 2022-11-01.-

Data.event_text: Four CEASA stores catch fire in Irajá, Rio de Janeiro.

links.text: -"Bombeiros combatem incêndio na Ceasa; houve saques e tiros para o alto". G1. 2022-10-31.-

Data.event_text: Former Rio de Janeiro councilor Gabriel Monteiro is arrested on charges of rape.

links.text: -"Ex-vereador Gabriel Monteiro é preso acusado de estupro". G1. 2022-11-07.-

Data.event_text: After a week trial, the 3rd Criminal Court of Niterói sentences former federal deputy and pastor Flordelis to 50 years and 28 days in prison for triple homicide, attempted double homicide, use of a false document, and armed criminal association for the murder of her husband, Pastor Anderson do Carmo.

links.text: -"Flordelis é condenada a 50 anos de prisão pelo homicídio do pastor Anderson do Carmo". G1. 13 November 2022.-

Data.event_text: Singer Milton Nascimento performs his final show at the Estádio do Mineirão, in Belo Horizonte.

links.text: -"Com choro e homenagem a Gal, Milton Nascimento se despede dos palcos". CNN Brasil. 13 November 2022.-

Data.event_text: A drifting ship hits one of the pillars of the Rio-Niterói Bridge, causing the road to be closed for over 3 hours.

links.text: -"Ponte Rio-Niterói é fechada após navio à deriva bater em um dos pilares". G1. 2022-11-14.-

Data.event_text: The mayor of the municipality Lajeado do Bugre in Rio Grande do Sul, Roberto Maciel Santos, is shot dead inside the city hall.

links.text: -"Prefeito de Lajeado do Bugre é morto a tiros dentro da prefeitura, diz BM". G1. November 24, 2022.-

Data.event_text: A shooting spree occurs at two schools in Aracruz, Espírito Santo, killing three people and injuring 13 others. The suspect, a 16-year-old boy, is arrested approximately four hours later.

links.text: -Mendonca, Duarte (November 25, 2022). "At least 3 people killed and 11 others injured in Brazil school shootings". CNN. Retrieved November 25, 2022.-
-"Filho de PM, atirador usou armas e carro do pai em Aracruz, diz polícia". noticias.uol.com.br (in Brazilian Portuguese). Retrieved 2022-11-26.-

Data.event_text: Heavy rains hit municipalities in eight states, causing floods and landslides.

links.text: -"Chuvas afetam oito estados pelo Brasil e matam ao menos 17 pessoas". CNN Brasil. December 5, 2022.-

Data.event_text: Bolsonaro supporters carry out vandalism attacks and attempt to invade the Federal Police headquarters in Brasília.

links.text: -"Bolsonaristas radicais tentam invadir prédio da PF e incendeiam carros e ônibus em Brasília; vias são bloqueadas". G1. 12 December 2022.-

Data.event_text: By 6 votes to 5, the Federal Supreme Court declares the secret budget unconstitutional.

links.text: -"STF declara 'orçamento secreto' inconstitucional". G1. 20 December 2022.-

Data.event_text: After 6 years and 1 month, the former governor of Rio de Janeiro Sérgio Cabral Filho leaves jail to serve house arrest. This is after the second panel of the STF decides to release him, as they understand that there was no final conviction.

links.text: -"Sérgio Cabral deixa a cadeia após seis anos de detenção". G1. 20 December 2022.-
